keyMoments.title: Leo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Leo appears before Marines on Green Bit and asks if they are good guys or bad guys. When they refuse to lay down their weapons, he and his fellow dwarves instantly strip them to their underwear.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Leo, a key member of the Tontatta tribe who becomes an important ally to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: Are you good guys or bad guys?

abilities.description: As a Tontatta dwarf, Leo possesses incredible speed that makes him appear invisible to normal humans.
Despite his tiny size, Leo has tremendous strength allowing him to easily overpower much larger opponents.

relationships.description: Leo and the Tontattas encounter Robin and Usopp on Green Bit, setting up their future alliance.

evolutionMoments.description: First encounter between Leo and the Straw Hat crew members on Green Bit.

reveals.information: Member of the Tontatta tribe, a race of dwarves
Possesses superhuman speed and strength despite tiny size

keyMoments.title: Wicca Captured by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Wicca is revealed as the 'fairy' who stole Zoro's sword in Dressrosa. After being caught, she sprained her ankle and berates herself for being captured.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Wicca and establishment of her role as a messenger for the Tontattas.

keyMoments.title: Wicca's Urgent Warning
keyMoments.description: Despite her injury, Wicca desperately begs Zoro to take her to the flower field to deliver a critical warning: the Donquixote family plans to attack the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Wicca's dedication to her mission and provides crucial intelligence to the Straw Hats about Doflamingo's plans.
keyMoments.quote: The Donquixote family is planning to attack the Straw Hat's ship!

abilities.description: As a Tontatta dwarf, Wicca possesses incredible speed that allows her to steal items without being seen.
Skilled at gathering intelligence and delivering important messages despite dangers.

relationships.description: After stealing Zoro's sword and being caught, Wicca enlists his help to deliver her urgent warning.

evolutionMoments.description: Wicca steals Zoro's sword, gets caught, and then asks for his help to deliver a warning.

reveals.information: On a mission to warn about the Donquixote family's attack on the Thousand Sunny

keyMoments.title: Robin Captures the Dwarves
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to capture the incredibly fast Tontatta dwarves, demonstrating her analytical abilities by identifying them as dwarves rather than invisible beings.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's quick thinking and her ability to deduce the nature of the 'invisible' attackers.

reveals.information: Demonstrates ability to catch extremely fast-moving targets with her Devil Fruit

keyMoments.title: Sanji Believes Violet's Tears
keyMoments.description: Despite being beaten and betrayed, Sanji declares that he believes Violet because of her tears, stating he would never doubt a woman's tears. This deeply touches Violet.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's unwavering chivalry and marks the turning point in Violet's allegiance, converting an enemy into an ally.
keyMoments.quote: I'd never doubt a woman's tears.

relationships.description: Despite being betrayed and beaten, Sanji's trust in Violet's tears converts her from enemy to ally.

evolutionMoments.description: Violet betrays Sanji, but his trust in her tears causes her to reveal her true allegiance.

reveals.information: Will never doubt a woman's tears, even when betrayed

keyMoments.title: Violet's Betrayal Revealed
keyMoments.description: Violet reveals she is an assassin for Doflamingo who fooled Sanji, leaving him beaten and surrounded by Doflamingo's men.
keyMoments.significance: Appears to establish Violet as an enemy, though her true allegiance is more complex.

keyMoments.title: Giro Giro no Mi Powers Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Violet uses her Giro Giro no Mi to see through Sanji's clothes and into his mind, attempting to gather intelligence about Law and Luffy's alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the full extent of Violet's Devil Fruit abilities and their intelligence-gathering applications.

keyMoments.title: Violet's True Allegiance Revealed
keyMoments.description: Touched by Sanji's trust, Violet defeats her own subordinates before they can kill Sanji and begins to reveal her true feelings and allegiance.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Violet's true loyalty is to Dressrosa, not Doflamingo, establishing her as a crucial ally.

abilities.description: Can see into people's minds using the Giro Giro no Mi.
Can see through clothing and objects.

relationships.description: Initially appears to betray Sanji, but his trust in her tears causes her to reveal her true allegiance and save him.

evolutionMoments.description: Violet's apparent betrayal is reversed when Sanji's trust moves her to reveal the truth.

reveals.information: Works for Doflamingo as an assassin in the Trébol Army
Can read minds and see through objects with Giro Giro no Mi
True loyalty is to Dressrosa, not Doflamingo

keyMoments.title: Zoro Captures the Sword Thief
keyMoments.description: Zoro successfully captures Wicca, the dwarf who stole his sword, causing her to sprain her ankle.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's ability to catch even the incredibly fast Tontattas.

relationships.description: After catching Wicca, Zoro agrees to help her deliver her urgent warning.

evolutionMoments.description: Zoro captures Wicca but agrees to help her with her mission.
